description: This submission is a hardcore solo video that you'll want to watch over and over again. The camera man mentioned that he loves filming his boyfriends jerking off. Over the years, he's filmed a ton of guys right in his apartment. He says that he isn't comfortable sharing his personal collection with the world because he still has a great relationship with most of his ex-boyfriends but this guy was the exception. Although he has parted ways with many of his past lovers, the last time our submitter saw this guy, he was walking out of a club while making out with another guy. He says it wouldn't have been that bad if they hadn't gone to the club together that night.
title: Jerky Boy
